/**
 * Product generated by hbm2java
 * 
 * Representa la tabla products de nuestra base de datos,
 * tal y como lo especifica la anotaci√≥n @Table.
 * 
 */
@Entity
@Table(name = "products", catalog = "storehz")
public class Product implements java.io.Serializable {

	private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
	// id_product BIGINT PRIMARY KEY
	private Long idProduct;
	
	// saved_by BIGINT
	// CONSTRAINT fk_product_user FOREIGN KEY(saved_by) REFERENCES users(id_user)
	private User user;
	
	// id_category BIGINT
	// CONSTRAINT fk_product_category FOREIGN KEY (id_category) REFERENCES categories(id_category)
	private Category category; 
	
	// product VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
	private String product;
	
	// price DOUBLE NOT NULL
	private Double price; 
	
	// description MEDIUMTEXT NOT NULL
	private String description; 
	
	// stock INT NOT NULL
	private Integer stock;
	
	// En la tabla photos_products, tenemos una referencia a la tabla products el cual nos
	// va a crear un lista de PhotoProduct @OneToMany.
	// CONSTRAINT fk_photo_product FOREIGN KEY (id_product) REFERENCES products(id_product)
	private Set&lt;PhotoProduct&gt; photoProducts = new HashSet&lt;PhotoProduct&gt;(0);

	public Product() {
	}
	
	...
	...
}
